original_text: Observe the month of Aviv and celebrate the Passover of the Lord your God, because in the month of Aviv he brought you out of Egypt by night.
korean_text: 아빕월을 지켜 네 하나님 여호와께 유월절을 행하라 이는 아빕월에 네 하나님 여호와께서 밤에 너를 애굽에서 인도하여 내셨음이라

sentences.original_text: and celebrate the Passover of the Lord your God
because in the month of Aviv
he brought you out of Egypt by night
